description: Implement Breadcrumbs component (~100 lines) for navigation path display. Includes: Breadcrumbs root, Breadcrumbs.Item (link with separator), Breadcrumbs.Current (non-link terminal). Uses Object.assign pattern, frozen B constant with CSS variable slots, automatic separator rendering, useTooltip integration, and data-* attributes (data-current, data-disabled). Reference: RAC Breadcrumbs docs.
title: Breadcrumbs component
